Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
mComm_InputBuffer
mComm_Opcode
mComm_OutputVector
mComm_StreamConfig
mComm_Vector
mTouch_AcquisitionDataStructure used to implement both a 12-bit and a 20-bit variable inside a single 32-bit array
mTouch_SensorVariablesContains all variables used in active mode which can/will be reinitialized after each mode switch
mTouch_StateCollection of single-bit flags used by the mTouch Framework
mTouch_StateVariablesContains sensor and state variables
